creditline: Gift of Jonas and Betsy Dovydenas
description: cartoonish image of a walking figure wearing a brown striped one-piece garment and yellow shoes, with a hole in the toe of one shoe and to back ripped out of the garment, with a face with many pink tentacles with eyes protruding from it and dark blonde hair; pink cat with arched back, LRC; orange cat at center right; maroon house with blue door and blue road/sidewalk extending from doorway at left; radiating sun with oranges, fluorescent red, yellow, and blue; mediums include crayon (?), pencil, marker, and spray paint; received glazed and in gold strip frame
title: A Great Day for Walking My Lizard
